meanings.definition: A crystalline compound with a characteristic blue color.
meanings.sent1: The phenazine sparkled with a beautiful blue hue.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the phenazine under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The phenazine decided to throw a blue-themed party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone like phenazine in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The blue phenazine stood out among the other crystals.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of organic compounds containing a tricyclic ring system.
meanings.sent1: The phenazine structure fascinated the chemistry students.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered a new phenazine compound in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The phenazine compound told a joke about benzene and cyclohexane.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a complex phenazine of thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The tricyclic phenazine compound glowed under UV light.
